title: How to Hide Instagram Posts from Certain Followers

steps.title: Open the Instagram app.
steps.content: Open the Instagram app . The icon is pink and has a white camera on it.

steps.title: Enter your login information if you aren't automatically signed in.
steps.content: Enter your login information if you aren't automatically signed in. If you do not have an existing account, you can create one by click Sign Up. You only have to log in if you're not automatically signed in already. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the user profile icon in the bottom right corner.
steps.content: Tap the user profile icon in the bottom right corner. [2] X Research source

steps.title: Tap the ☰ button located at the top right of the screen.
steps.content: Tap the ☰ button located at the top right of the screen. A side menu should appear on the right side of your screen.

steps.title: Tap the settings on the bottom of the side menu.
steps.content: Tap the settings on the bottom of the side menu.

steps.title: Select Close Friends.
steps.content: Select Close Friends . [3] X Research source

steps.title: Enter a friend's username and press Add next to their name.
steps.content: Enter a friend's username and press Add next to their name. This will add that friend to your "Close Friends" list. You can edit that list on the Your List tab. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Take a photo or video for your story.
steps.content: Take a photo or video for your story. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Send To.
steps.content: Tap Send To .

steps.title: Tap Close Friends Only.
steps.content: Tap Close Friends Only . This will only share your story with the users that you've added to your Close Friends list. [6] X Research source You can also select specific users to send your photo or video to.

steps.title: Open the Instagram app.
steps.content: Open the Instagram app. The icon is pink and has a white camera on it.

steps.title: Enter your login information if you aren't automatically signed in.
steps.content: Enter your login information if you aren't automatically signed in. If you do not have an existing account, you can create one by click Sign Up. You only have to log in if you're not automatically signed in already. [7] X Research source

steps.title: Tap on the follower that you want to hide.
steps.content: Tap on the follower that you want to hide. You can find users through the search function or by clicking on their username. [8] X Research source

steps.title: Tap on … button located at the top right of the screen.
steps.content: Tap on … button located at the top right of the screen. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Tap Mute.
steps.content: Tap Mute . You can either "mute posts," "mute story" or "mute posts and story". Muting a user will stop their posts or stories from showing up on your feed. The user won't know that you've muted them, and you'll still be able to view that user's posts on their profile page. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Instagram app.
steps.content: Open the Instagram app. The icon is pink and has a white camera on it.

steps.title: Enter your login information.
steps.content: Enter your login information. If you do not have an existing account, you can create one by click Sign Up. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Click the user profile icon in the bottom right corner.
steps.content: Click the user profile icon in the bottom right corner.

steps.title: Click the ☰ button located at the top right of the screen.
steps.content: Click the ☰ button located at the top right of the screen. A side menu should appear on the right side of your screen. Skip to the next step if you're on a computer.

steps.title: Click the settings on the bottom of the side menu.
steps.content: Click the settings on the bottom of the side menu. [12] X Research source

steps.title: Select privacy and security.
steps.content: Select privacy and security . This is the fifth option on the settings menu.

steps.title: Click account privacy.
steps.content: Click account privacy . This should be at the top of the menu.

steps.title: Tap next to private account.
steps.content: Tap next to private account. Now followers will have to request to follow you. [13] X Research source

steps.title: Open the Instagram app.
steps.content: Open the Instagram app. The icon is pink and has a white camera on it.

steps.title: Enter your login information.
steps.content: Enter your login information. If you do not have an existing account, you can create one by click Sign Up. [14] X Research source

steps.title: Click on the follower that you want to hide your Instagram posts from.
steps.content: Click on the follower that you want to hide your Instagram posts from. You can find users through the search function or click on their name in your feed. [15] X Research source

steps.title: Click on … button.
steps.content: Click on … button. This is located on the top right of the screen.

steps.title: Click on Block.
steps.content: Click on Block . This will block your profile, posts, and stories from this user. [16] X Research source
